scripts.integration-tests:backend-only: docker compose -f docker-compose.integration-tests.yml up testDB backend
scripts.start:prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml up --build
scripts.publish:server: cd server && docker build -f Dockerfile.production . -t scrip/wns-livecodings-server && docker push scrip/wns-livecodings-server && cd ..
scripts.publish:client: cd client && docker build -f Dockerfile.production -t scrip/wns-livecodings-client . && docker push scrip/wns-livecodings-client && cd ..
